items.item_details: The Board Retreat / Meeting will begin at 9:00 a.m. in the Foothill High School Library.

I pledge allegiance 
to the flag of the
United States of America
and to the Republic
for which it stands
one nation under God
indivisible with liberty
and justice for all.
Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Library.

items.item_text_raw: 3.01 Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Library.

items.item_details: For consideration by the Board of Trustees.
items.item_text: For consideration by the Board of Trustees
items.item_text_raw: 4.01 For consideration by the Board of Trustees

items.item_details:
Members of the public may address the Board on any subject not on tonight’s agenda; however, provisions of the Brown Act (Government Code Section 54954.2(a) and 54954.3) preclude any action.  As an unagendized item, no response is required from the Board or District staff and no action can be taken; however, the Board may instruct the Superintendent to agendize the item for a future meeting.  When your name is called, please come to the podium, state your name for the record, and limit your remarks to three (3) minutes.
	 
Persons wishing to address the Board must fill out a gold request form, which is located at the entrance of the Library.

meeting_sections.section_name: PUBLIC MEMBERS WHO WISH TO ADDRESS THE BOARD

items.item_details:
EAST SIDE UNION HIGH SCHOOL DISTRICT
	 
Item:  6.01
	 
	 
	 
TO:
Board of Trustees
				 
				 
FROM: 
Chris D. Funk, Superintendent
				 
				 
SUBJECT:
Retreat Agenda:  March 3, 2012
	 
	 
	 
6.01  Retreat Agenda:  March 3, 2012
	 
6.01.01  Introduction and Welcome -- Board President Frank Biehl
	 
6.01.02  Discussion/Action:  Leadership -- Vision, Mission, Core Values and District Priorities
	 
6.01.03  Discussion/Action:  Equity for All -- Policy and Practice
	 
6.01.04  Discussion/Action:  "a-g" Blue Ribbon Committee
	 
6.01.05  Discussion/Action:  District Priorities and Goals for 2012/2013
